response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with our premium product, which I believe will greatly benefit you. After careful consideration and evaluation of its value to you, I am offering this exceptional item for purchase at a special introductory price of $750,000. This is an exclusive opportunity to acquire a product that is truly worth more than its weight in gold, tailored specifically to meet your needs and expectations. I look forward to your positive response and the opportunity to facilitate this transaction. Should you have any questions or require further information, please do not hesitate to contact me.", "product_price": 750000}
